# homeBudget

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of homeBudget is to make monitoring expenses easy.
Collect all expenses into one place, in a consistent form, with custom categories.
  
## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rkuttner7/homeBudget")
```

Windows users also must first install [Rtools](http://cran.rstudio.com/bin/windows/Rtools/).

## Resources

For details on uploading csv statements as well as saving and loading your data see the `getting-started` vingette and for an expense report example see `\rmd\budgetReport.Rmd`.
